Calling all Davio's fans and summer lovers! ‚òÄÔ∏è We're giving away a $50 gift card to Davio's so you can celebrate the best of the season!

At Davio‚Äôs, we elevate the art of dining and our Popovers are no exception. Light and airy on the inside with a golden & crispy exterior! Accompanied by creamy butter, these heavenly creations melt in your mouth only to leave you craving for more‚Ä¶

Our residents are loving the Davio's Happy Hour! üç∑üçù There's nothing like enjoying delicious Italian steakhouse favorites in great company. Cheers to good times and great food! #LiveGrandscape #Davio's #HappyHour

Exploring Northern Italy in Northern DFW üáÆüáπ‚ú® 

Dress to impress at @daviosthecolony in Grandscape - a chic Northern Italian Steakhouse with a global reputation. Lucky for us, we have a slice of Italian luxury right here in DFW! 

üçÖCrispy Calamari, Aioli Sauce 
üçÖTagliatelle Bolognese, Braised Veal, Beef, Pork, San Marzano Tomatoes
üçÖBraised Beef Short Ribs, Creamy Potatoes, Crispy Onions
üç∞ Tiramisu ‚Äî Espresso Soaked Ladyfingers, Mascarpone Cream

Whether you‚Äôre out for date night like us, or planning a work power lunch or a glitzy celebration, Davios has the space and dining experience for you!

Have you been to Davio‚Äôs lately? It‚Äôs one of our go-to spots for date night or even a fancy family dinner! After a delicious meal (and dessert!) at @daviosrestaurant, you can explore everything the rest of @grandscapetx has to offer. @daviosthecolony 

#davios #grandscapetx #itsallabouttheguest

Celebrate National Fruit Day with a Davio's Twist!
Forget the ordinary fruit salad ‚Äì today, we're indulging in pure summery delight with Davio's decadent panna cotta.  This light and creamy dessert boasts a smooth vanilla base, perfectly complemented by a cascade of fresh, seasonal berries.  It's a taste sensation you won't want to miss!
Happy 4th of July! üá∫üá∏ Wishing everyone a joyful and safe Independence Day celebration from all of us at Davio's. Enjoy the festivities & fireworks! üéÜ

National Fried Chicken Day calls for a worthy celebration! Our Bar Menu Crispy Chicken Sliders feature crispy, juicy fried chicken tenders nestled on toasted brioche buns with Pickles and Caper Aioli! Head to our bar and celebrate National Fried Chicken Day the Davio's way!

National Mac and Cheese Day: Calling all little (and big!) cheese lovers!
Today we celebrate the ultimate comfort food, and at Davios, we're making it extra fun with our Kids Mac and Cheese! This creamy, cheesy dish is perfect for picky eaters and grown-up nostalgia alike.
Bring the whole family in and let's celebrate National Macaroni Day the cheesy way!

Indulge in pure chocolate bliss this National Chocolate Day! Our Davio's Warm Chocolate Cake is a symphony of textures and flavors, featuring a warm, gooey center and a rich chocolate sauce. The perfect way to celebrate life's sweetest moments.

We had a fantastic evening pairing @scoutandcellar wines with @daviosrestaurant impeccable menu offerings!! 
 üç∑ Scout and Cellar has a new organic wine called Scout Wild and let me tell you it is delicious. üôåüèª
 Davios hosts wine pairing dinners, as well as a myriad of other events, so definitely check out their calendar üìÜ for what‚Äôs coming up next. 
 These events are intimate and top-notch as you would expect from Davios üòÅ
 This event was held at the beautiful @grandscapetx location 

  Here‚Äôs what was on our menu

Benvenuto

Lady Fingers, Mixed Berries

 All locations put on different events, so make sure to check out the Davios closest to you and enjoy an unforgettable evening!!

**National Mojito Day? We'll mint to that! **
Indulge in the refreshing taste of summer with a Davio's mojito. This handcrafted cocktail combines fresh mint, zesty limes, and premium rums, creating a taste of paradise in every sip. The perfect way to unwind after a long day.

Celebrate National French Fry Day with a touch of sophistication! Indulge in our Davio's Parmigiano Fries - hand-cut potato perfection, delicately seasoned with Parmigiano Reggiano cheese and accompanied by our rich truffle aioli. A side dish that elevates any meal.

Davio‚Äôs Introduces New Italian Cream Sodas Inspired by the vibrant emotions of the new Inside Out 2 movie now playing @galaxytheatresgrandscape 

These unique and refreshing flavors are sure to delight your taste buds and add a burst of color to your day.

New Italian Cream Soda Flavors:
Pistachio: A calming, creamy blend that soothes the soul.
Dragon Fruit: A joyful, exotic flavor that brings a smile to every sip.
Lavender: A peaceful and aromatic treat for moments of tranquility.
Spicy Mango: An exciting, bold twist that ignites your senses.
Join us at Davio‚Äôs to try these delicious new beverages and let your emotions run wild with every sip!

Tag a friend who would love these for a chance to win tickets to the movie! üé´üéüÔ∏èüçøü•§
Cheers to Guys Night Out üçª @grandscapetx

When is a better time than now to celebrate the end National Picnic Month with a Davio‚Äôs To Go picnicüß∫ Celebrate with your favorite Davio's spread order online ahead on davio‚Äôs.com for pick up! ‚òÄÔ∏è *picnic basket not included

It's National Avocado Day, but who needs toast when you have Davio's Asian Chopped Salad? This refreshing salad is packed with flavor and texture, featuring perfectly ripe avocado, crispy noodles, and a delicious lime ponzu sauce. A healthy and delicious way to celebrate!

Feeling spritzy? It's National Spritz Day, and Davio's is the perfect place to celebrate!  We've got classic spritzes like Aperol Spritz and refreshing new takes on this bubbly favorite. Grab a friend, soak up the sunshine (or the AC!), and toast to a delightful day!

National Watermelon Day? Davio's is grilling it up!
Forget the ordinary, this National Watermelon Day treat yourself to our show-stopping grilled watermelon salad! Imagine succulent watermelon slices, perfectly charred on the grill, paired with peppery arugula, creamy feta cheese, and crispy prosciutto. A tangy touch of pickled onion and refreshing cucumber add another layer of flavor, while our aged balsamic reduction brings everything together in a symphony of sweet, savory, and acidic notes.
It's a taste of summer reimagined! Come celebrate National Watermelon Day with a Davio's twist.

Forget the ordinary cookies ‚Äì today, we're indulging in a sophisticated sweet tooth celebration at Davio's!
National Chocolate Chip Cookie Day calls for a delightful pairing: our chocolate chip biscotti dunked in a rich, aromatic espresso. The perfect balance of textures and flavors ‚Äì a dunkable delight for any cookie monster (or coffee connoisseur)!
Come raise a cup (and a biscotti) with us!

Celebrate the world of white wines with a touch of class on National White Wine Day!  Our Davio's Reserve Sauvignon Blanc boasts a vibrant bouquet of citrus and tropical fruits, balanced by a crisp acidity. The perfect accompaniment to seafood, light salads, or simply enjoyed on its own.

Celebrate the bounty of the sea on National Oysters Day with Davio's exquisite Oysters Rockefeller! Fresh oysters are broiled to perfection and bathed in a rich spinach, Pernod, and breadcrumb topping. A timeless appetizer that is both elegant and incredibly flavorful.
Seared salmon roasted fingerling potato sweet pea pur√©e tomatoe corn relish featur tonight prepared by Executive Chef Justin Albertson ‚ú®

Embrace the versatility of zucchini on National Zucchini Day with Davio's! The Awaken 180 menu  offers a light and flavorful option with Zucchini Noodles. These spiralized vegetables are tossed with our signature Davio's Chicken Sausage, balanced by zesty Hot Cherry Peppers and a touch of Lemon Butter. A healthy and satisfying dish that's perfect for any occasion.
Ditch the boring and celebrate National Panini Day the Davio's way! Our lunch menu features a selection of gourmet paninis, overflowing with fresh ingredients toasted to perfection.

Celebrate the king of cuts on National Filet Mignon Day at Davio's Italian Steakhouse. Our hand-selected filet mignon is cooked to your exact preference, delivering an unparalleled dining experience. The perfect choice for a special occasion or a luxurious everyday treat.

Pop the bubbly, it's National Prosecco Day! And where better to celebrate than Davio's? We've got a fantastic selection of Italian fizz, perfect for starting your meal or raising a toast to good times. Let's get this party prosecco-ing!

Exclusive Workshop Hosted by Local Artist, Alli Koch!

Join Davio‚Äôs Northern Italian Steakhouse, located in The Colony at Grandscape, for an exclusive workshop hosted by Local Artist, Alli Koch. Alli is a Dallas-based artist who specializes in black and white illustrations, most notably her large-scale floral murals which you can find painted throughout the state of Texas and beyond. Alli has turned her creativity and passion into a full-time, self-made career that has gained her national notoriety in the art world. Alli is a published author of eight books and uses her platform as a career-artist to speak about business and entrepreneurship on panels around the country and her podcast ‚ÄúBreakfast with Sis‚Äù which she records with her dad every Saturday morning.

On Thursday, August 15th from 4:30 PM ‚Äì 6:30 PM, guests are invited to enjoy chef selected appetizers (listed below) and a Champagne tasting provided by Veuve Clicquot as you master your freehand drawing and painting skills during a hands-on workshop led by Alli Koch.

Pinot Noir lovers, rejoice! It's National Pinot Noir Day! Celebrate with Davio's Reserve Pinot Noir - a light-bodied red bursting with flavors of cherry, raspberry, and a hint of earth. Pairs perfectly with everything from roasted chicken to grilled salmon!
Gluten free penne bolognese ‚≠êÔ∏è @grandscapetx #glutenfree #glutenfreefood #davios #dallas #thecolony #finedining
Pan seared George‚Äôs Banks Sea Scallops over a zesty orange vinaigrette  with crispy capers and fresh tarragon feature tonight by Executive Sous Chef Ryan Henigsmith ‚ú®üì∏

It's National Bacon Lovers Day, and we're not just throwing some bacon bits on a salad (although, those are delicious too!). At Davio's, we celebrate with our legendary Steakhouse Burger featuring a juicy patty, melty Vermont cheddar, and the star of the show - crispy, thick-cut bacon. All tied together with our addictive herb aioli.
This ain't your average bacon burger. This is a bacon masterpiece!

Looking for a upscale dinner spot after visiting @worldsprings?üçΩüç∏ 

What better way to end a #daycation in The Colony then a nice steakhouse dinner!ü•© I enjoyed my visit to @daviosthecolony which is 5 min from World Springs at the @grandscapetx ! 

This two level restaurant serves really good Italian steakhouse and seafood! They are based in Boston which is cool because they import all their seafood from Boston and its really good! ü¶êü¶ûü¶Ä 

The scallops and crab cake were amazing and fresh and I really likes the Filet Mignon! They have a great selection of desserts to choose from as well! So I highly recommend visiting Davios for lunch or dinner!üíï #sponsored #FFFierceTravels #FFFierceFoodie #daviosrestaurant #visitthecolony #worldsprings #grandscape #dfwfoodie #dallasfoodie #dallasfoodblogger

Unwind and celebrate National Sweet Tea Day with a Davio's tradition! Our famous sweet tea is brewed to perfection, offering a touch of sweetness and a delightful refreshment.  The perfect accompaniment to a delicious meal or a cool treat on a warm day.

üçΩÔ∏è @daviosthecolony is an Italian steakhouse, located in The Colony, that is known for an extensive menu, wine list, and cocktails!

Raise a glass to the king of red grapes! It's National Cabernet Sauvignon Day, and Davio's has the perfect pour waiting for you! Our Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon boasts rich flavors of blackberry, currant, and a touch of spice. A bold and beautiful wine for a celebratory day!
Happy Labor Day from all of us at Davio's! üåüüá∫üá∏ ‚ú®
